name: Pup2 - Lunar Stroll (Demo)
description:
Welcome to the world of Power Up Player 2!

We see Players 1 & 2 in-between The New World on the Moon!  Getting closer to defeating the Purple Bean!

Watch out though! There may be some mysterious figures lurking around!

Press [Z] to jump and to start the game

And Press [X] to use the mystery mechanic used in the original Pup2 game!
